AES256v2Cryptor - Class in org.cryptonode.jncryptor
This JNCryptor instance produces data in version 2 format.

G

getCryptor() - Static method in class org.cryptonode.jncryptor.JNCryptorFactory
Retrieves an JNCryptor implementing the current data format (determined by seeking the implementation with the largest version number).
getCryptor(int) - Static method in class org.cryptonode.jncryptor.JNCryptorFactory
Retrieves an JNCryptor implementing the specified version number.
getCryptorForCiphertext(byte[]) - Static method in class org.cryptonode.jncryptor.JNCryptorFactory
Examines the first byte of the ciphertext, which contains a version byte.
getCryptors() - Static method in class org.cryptonode.jncryptor.JNCryptorFactory
Returns a list of the available JNCryptors, arranged in ascending order of version number.

I

InvalidHMACException - Exception in org.cryptonode.jncryptor
An InvalidHMACException is thrown when the HMAC value is incorrect, indicating that the data is corrupted.

J

JNCryptor - Interface in org.cryptonode.jncryptor
An JNCryptor encrypts and decrypts data in a proprietary format originally devised by Rob Napier.
JNCryptorFactory - Class in org.cryptonode.jncryptor
Factory used to obtain JNCryptor instances.

K

keyForPassword(char[], byte[]) - Method in class org.cryptonode.jncryptor.AES256v2Cryptor
 
keyForPassword(char[], byte[]) - Method in interface org.cryptonode.jncryptor.JNCryptor
Generates a key given a password and salt using a PBKDF.
